title: Bloomberg Markets:  Vorhaus Previews VidCon
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets:  Vorhaus Previews VidCon
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Vorhaus President Magid Advisors Discussing digital video, growth of OTT, SVOD, and streaming from Vidcon conference in Anaheim, CA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
